name: Suburbs Of The Dead
description:
My name is Sami Zirak and Suburbs Of The Dead was my final project for my first year of university on my Computing & Games Development course. We were given 10 weeks to produce a top down 2D Zombie game and this is my final product.

After having put so much time and care into this game for 10 weeks I felt that it would be a shame to leave it there so I plan on continuing the development of this game in my spare time which will include:

> The addition of new levels.

> The addition of more guns.

> The addition of new zombie types.

> The addition of new gameplay mechanics.

> The addition of more features.

Features

> Two weapons to kill the undead with.

> The Upgrade Workbench which allows you to power up Eric's killing capabilities.

> A lengthy level which will require patience and progression to beat.

Feedback

As a second year Games Development student more than anything I am asking for feedback and constructive criticism, so please feel free to leave some in the comments below. If you wish to follow this games development process please feel free to follow my developer blog that is linked below.

Developer Blog --> http://szdev.tumblr.com/
